metadata.name: The City of Your Dream
metadata.description:
A picturesque of an underlying beauty in a bustling city, imparting tranquility and inviting scenery. This reveals not only the reflection of an exquisitely industrialized metropolis, but as well the reflection of every visionary’s dream made into reality.

Collector of this NFT will receive a physical 20" x 30" fine-art print with certificate of authenticity - ships anywhere in the world.

Artist: Altair Rey Emia
Date Taken: June 28, 2020
Edition: 1/1
Pixel Size: 3712 × 5124
